system.availability: A Valuable if annoying to use Source of data about a specific planet. Roughly the size of a dataslate. Requires -40 Tech-Use Test to provide access to data on single planet the Codex is based on, reduced to -10 if user has Forbidden Lore (Archeotech),  Failed tech use may give false info or leave some out. Info Provided is GM dependent. See -->
system.cost: Example Data: Full Planetary Map, common animal/plant species, list of valuable resources+quantities, recent Xenos activity+location, historical use of planet, etc.
